document_title: Whitmore disease (bacterial infection): Causes, symptoms, prevention
subsection_content:
Whitmore bacteria can live for many years in soil and water. People and animals that come into direct contact with this soil/water source will be at risk of contracting Melioidosis. Ways of direct contact include:
Inhalation of contaminated dust or water droplets;; Drinking contaminated water that has not been chlorinated;; Touch the contaminated area with your hands or feet, especially if there are scratches on the skin.
subsection_title: benh whitmore.json. The cause to the illness
